oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Sharḥ Burdat al-madīḥ : manuscript, 1474
Taʻlīq laṭīf malīḥ ʻalá Burdat al-madīḥ
Sharḥ Qaṣīdat al-Burdah
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Maḥallī, Jalāl al-Dīn Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad , 1389-1459
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: وكان الفراغ من هذا الشرح المبارك يوم الجمعة رابع عشر من رمضان سنة ثمان وسبعين وثمان مائة بالقاهرة ... :Colophon
Written in one column, 15 lines per page, in black rubricated in red. Comments in the margins.
According to the colophon (f. 32v), copy completed on 24 Ramaḍān 878 AH [February 11, 1474 AD] in Cairo, in the hand of ʻAbd al-Wahhāb ibn Muḥammad ibn ʻAlī al-Danjāwī (?).
MS Arab 261. Houghton Library, Harvard University.
